about_the_game:
Thought you’d saved them all? Think again, as Abe stumbles across one last Mudokon hidden away in RuptureFarms, and it’s one Mudokon that Oddworld fans might have heard about.

Set in all new never-seen-before areas of the factory, Alf’s Escape is an expansion pack designed to challenge even the best New ‘n’ Tasty players.
detailed_description:
Thought you’d saved them all? Think again, as Abe stumbles across one last Mudokon hidden away in RuptureFarms, and it’s one Mudokon that Oddworld fans might have heard about.

Set in all new never-seen-before areas of the factory, Alf’s Escape is an expansion pack designed to challenge even the best New ‘n’ Tasty players.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or similar
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 750K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8.5 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5700
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
